::KitKat::

She looked down at the floor and felt depressed.
"If I can't replace my arm, I can't fight. If I can't fight....." her 
voice trailed off.
She said in a hushed voice. "I'll be scrapped if I can't fight."
She layed down in wolf mode and put her head on her one paw.  She 
looked up at the others.  She felt like it was hopeless.
Megatron would have her ordered to be scrapped or recycled into a 
more useful bot.  That thought, of termination, sent a cold shiver 
through her mind.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Talon Harvilicz <talon_the_rider@y...> 
wrote:
> 
> Terrorsaur:
>  
> 
> Terrorsaur nodded to DrillBit. "I was wondering myself. Looks like 
we'll find out later." He glared down on KitKat. He made a nervous 
face. He didn't know Predacons said Thank you. 
> 
> "I'm not the best maintenace bot," he said to her. "But maybe I can 
do something. I don't know what though." He looked at DrillBit."Got 
an idea?"
>
